# The Hurricane!
## Look at the destruction
## There used to be a house here
![](http://www.schlatter.org/images/Katrina/Lot%20photos/jimmys%20house.JPG)

> Our families savings are gone!

# The Dream
## Look at how cute my kids are.
### We've been telling them for months that we're going to Disney World
### Don't let our kids hope be demolished like our house!
![](http://assets5.cutegirlshairstyles.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/Family.jpg)

# How I'm gonna pay back
## I'm a professional
## I'll pay it back in no time, I just need the money in the next week to take our kids
![](https://cdn.shutterstock.com/shutterstock/videos/2220682/thumb/1.jpg)

# Where the money goes
## To immediately taking our kids to Disney World!
![](https://media.licdn.com/mpr/mpr/p/8/005/082/2b0/32540c2.jpg)
# Thank you from my whole family!
